column5: I know Ron had posted this earlier but a reminder never hurts  http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/en/Business/LetsF...age/264453.html

Thanks for posting that TB.  I was just about to post the reminder myself. I will be attending the Coboconk, Peterborough, Port Hope and possibly the Oshawa meeting. Look forward to seeing some familiar faces in the crowd.   Cheers, Ron....

Just a reminder that the Coboconk meeting is tomorrow night. Show up and hear detailed information on the fishery, have youropinion heard or show your support for the proposed regulations. I will be at this meeting as well as Peterborough, Port Hope and Oshawa.
